content: The Plaguebane Gourd is a unique Gourd in Black Myth: Wukong in that it offers an effect focused entirely around not refilling your health. The Rare Gourd comes with the bonus of halving your health recovery when using it, but your attack is increased for a short duration.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Plaguebane_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Plaguebane Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Plaguebane Gourd is a unique Gourd in Black Myth: Wukong in that it offers an effect focused entirely around not refilling your health. The Rare Gourd comes with the bonus of halving your health recovery when using it, but your attack is increased for a short duration.
